We're Getting Married!

Welcome! We are both very excited for all of you to share our wedding day in the fall. This little website will let you meet the lovely members of our wedding party, view the venue and accommodations, contribute to our gift registry, and most importantly, RSVP for the big day!

Saturday September 26, 2015 at The Club at Bond Head

Need Accomodations? Receive special rates with Best Western Voyageur Place Hotel

Bridesmaids & Groomsmen

Jessica Pietrusiak Maid of Honour

The bride's favourite, and only sister, Jessica, has recently finished her law degree at the University of Ottawa. This summer she'll begin an articling position at Stikeman Elliot in downtown Toronto.

Lauren Herridge

Having first met the bride and groom in high school, Lauren has been close friends with the couple for over 10 years. She is a physiotherapist at Southlake Hospital in Newmarket, and a mama to her 120lb Bernese Mountain dog, Sulley.

Danielle Tassone

Obviously the one with the good looks in the family, Danielle is Nick's younger sister. She is a design consultant at Paradise Homes, and a yogi extraordinaire.

Chris Lubker Best Man

Having met when they were neighbors in Bradford, Chris and Nick have been best of friends for over 20 years now. Chris, recently married to his beautiful wife Jessica, runs his own custom carpentry business.

Andrew Guytingco

Andrew has known the couple from their elementary school days at St. Nicholas. This world traveller has visited parts of Africa, Asia, and Europe, along the way donating his time and money to worthy charities. Andrew is a successful engineer, and operates his own engineering company in Newmarket.

Neil Dattani

Neil met the couple when he and Nick began their first year of medical school at the University of Toronto. Now five years, and countless library study sessions later, Neil is in his second year as a resident in Family Medicine at Sunnybrook Hospital in Toronto.
